title: Belle & Sebastian type ID
content:
Hi everyone, I’m pretty new to the board, but I was hoping someone might help me out. I’ve already exhausted Idenitifont & WhattheFont...

What font is B&S using on the “I’m Waking Up to Us” EP? I’ve attached the image.

Thanks in advance!

Regards, Jim

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [135.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164253/http:/typophile.com/files/135.jpg) | 29.05 KB |

 [‹ "Legalize LA" American Apparel FONT ID](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164253/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44897 "Go to previous forum topic") [not Harlow or Horatio..but.. ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164253/http:/www.typophile.com/node/44895 "Go to next forum topic")
author: 60watt

comments.content:
Hi Jim,

possibly it’s [Poster Bodoni Italic](http://web.archive.org/web/20081007164253/http:/www.fontshop.com/search/?q=bodoni+poster+italic&site=d&sample_text=I%E2%80%99m%20Waking%20Up%20to%20Us&sample_size=32).  
F
